title: Spicy pancetta, tomato and basil sauce with tagliatelle
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon olive oil', '150g (5oz) ready–diced pancetta pieces', '1 medium red onion, chopped finely', '1/2 medium heat red chilli, de–seeded and chopped finel', '1 large garlic clove, crushed', '400g (14oz) baby plum tomatoes, cut into quarters', '125ml (1/2 cup) water (or dry white wine)', '2 tablespoons tomato purée', 'small handful fresh basil leaves', '2 tablespoons fresh chopped flat leaf parsley', 'freshly ground black pepper', '350 (12oz) dried tagliatelle', '2 tablespoons coarsely grated Fontina cheese']
